description: Try our easy to follow Indian-Spiced Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato bake,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Spinach,Dairy free
name: Indian-Spiced Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coriander sprigs, finely chopped (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut potatoes into 1.5cm chunks. Place in a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat, reduce to a simmer and par-cook for 8 minutes.

Meanwhile, place oil and mustard seeds in a frying pan. Heat over medium-high heat until seeds start to pop (about 1-2 minutes). Add onion and cook, stirring often, for 5 minutes or until starting to brown. Stir in garlic, turmeric and garam masala and season with salt. Cook for 1 minute. Add potato and 1/3 cup water, stir well, and simmer for 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender and water has evaporated.
Remove from heat, add spinach leaves and stir through to wilt. Garnish with coriander and serve.
